cast.name: 阿玉松·玛尼提 Anusorn Maneeted

this_title: สายลับหมากระเป๋ากับเสาไฟฟ้า
introduction: Shisu, a reporter, is good at everything, but she is only 155 cm tall, so she is often teased. One day, she happened to meet Fayfa, a tall policeman who she has secretly admired since university days. The two together investigated the case by allowing Shisu to disguise herself as an idol in a club. But will the work lead to her fulfilment of the heart or not?
foreign_title: สายลับหมากระเป๋ากับเสาไฟฟ้า
